queries.query:
from(bucket: "kre/autogen")
  |> range(start: dashboardTime)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "workflow_elapsed_time" and (r._field == "elapsed_ms"))
  |> keep(columns: ["version", "workflow", "_value"])
  |> group(columns: ["workflow", "version"])
  |> reduce(fn: (r, accumulator) => ({
    min: if r._value < accumulator.min then r._value else accumulator.min,
    max: if r._value > accumulator.max then r._value else accumulator.max,
    total: r._value + accumulator.total,
    count: accumulator.count + 1.0
   }), identity: {min: 999999999.0, max: 0.0, total: 0.0, count: 0.0})
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with avg: r.total / r.count }))
  |> drop(columns: ["count"])
  |> group(columns: ["workflow"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ "1": r.workflow, "2": r.version, "3": r.min, "4": r.max, "5": r.avg, "6": r.total})) // Hack due to no reorder column support
  |> rename(columns: { "1": "Workflow", "2": "Version", "3": "Min", "4": "Max", "5": "Avg", "6": "Total" })

queryConfig.rawText:
from(bucket: "kre/autogen")
  |> range(start: dashboardTime)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "workflow_elapsed_time" and (r._field == "elapsed_ms"))
  |> keep(columns: ["version", "workflow", "_value"])
  |> group(columns: ["workflow", "version"])
  |> reduce(fn: (r, accumulator) => ({
    min: if r._value < accumulator.min then r._value else accumulator.min,
    max: if r._value > accumulator.max then r._value else accumulator.max,
    total: r._value + accumulator.total,
    count: accumulator.count + 1.0
   }), identity: {min: 999999999.0, max: 0.0, total: 0.0, count: 0.0})
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with avg: r.total / r.count }))
  |> drop(columns: ["count"])
  |> group(columns: ["workflow"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ "1": r.workflow, "2": r.version, "3": r.min, "4": r.max, "5": r.avg, "6": r.total})) // Hack due to no reorder column support
  |> rename(columns: { "1": "Workflow", "2": "Version", "3": "Min", "4": "Max", "5": "Avg", "6": "Total" })

queries.query:
from(bucket: "kre/autogen")
  |> range(start: dashboardTime)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "results" )
  |> duplicate(column: "_value", as: "Result")
  |> group(columns: ["version", "node", "_field", "Result", "request"])
  |> count()
  |> group(columns: ["version"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ "1": r.version, "2": r.node, "3": r.request, "4": r._field, "5": r.Result, "6": r._value})) // Hack due to no reorder column support
  |> rename(columns: { "1": "Version", "2": "Node", "3": "Request", "4": "Tag or Release", "5": "Result", "6": "Number of Times Returned" })
  |> sort(columns: ["Number of Times Returned"], desc: true)

queries.query:
from(bucket: "kre/autogen")
  |> range(start: dashboardTime)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "requests" and r._field == "requested_component")
  |> duplicate(column: "_value", as: "request")
  |> group(columns: ["request", "version"])
  |> count()
  |> group(columns: ["version"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ "1": r.version, "2": r.request, "3": r._value})) // Hack due to no reorder column support
  |> rename(columns: { "1": "Version", "2": "Requested Component", "3": "Number of Requests"})
  |> sort(columns: ["Number of Requests"], desc: true)

queries.query:
from(bucket: "kre/autogen")
  |> range(start: dashboardTime)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "requests" )
  |> keep(columns: ["_time"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: 1 }))
  |> group()
  |> aggregateWindow(every: autoInterval, fn: sum)

queryConfig.rawText:

  |> group()
  |> aggregateWindow(every: autoInterval, fn: sum)

cells.name: Number of Calls for Each Node

queries.query:
from(bucket: "kre/autogen")
  |> range(start: dashboardTime)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "node_elapsed_time" and (r._field == "elapsed_ms"))
  |> duplicate(column: "node", as: "node")
  |> group(columns: ["node", "version"])
  |> count()
  |> group(columns: ["version"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ "1": r.version, "2": r.node, "3": r._value})) // Hack due to no reorder column support
  |> rename(columns: { "1": "Version", "2": "Called Node", "3": "Number of Calls"})

queryConfig.rawText:
from(bucket: "kre/autogen")
  |> range(start: dashboardTime)

  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ "1": r.version, "2": r.node, "3": r._value})) // Hack due to no reorder column support
  |> rename(columns: { "1": "Version", "2": "Called Node", "3": "Number of Calls"})
